# nacos_role (Data Source)

Nacos role data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nacos_role" "example" {
  role_name = "example_role"
}

output "role_details" {
  value = data.nacos_role.example
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the role
- `username` (String) Username of the role

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the role, in the format of `<name>:<username>`.
